com.twitter.heron.healthmgr.common

Class TopologyProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twitter.heron.healthmgr.common.TopologyProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.microsoft.dhalion.events.EventHandler<HealthManagerEvents.TopologyUpdate>, javax.inject.Provider<com.twitter.heron.api.generated.TopologyAPI.Topology>

    @Singleton
public class TopologyProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.inject.Provider<com.twitter.heron.api.generated.TopologyAPI.Topology>, com.microsoft.dhalion.events.EventHandler<HealthManagerEvents.TopologyUpdate>
    A topology may be updated after initial deployment. This provider is used to provide the latest version to any dependent components.
